title: I got off Chat restricted and why can't I get rewards !
body: I got S- on my Zac and he is level 5 and It said due to behavior and I can't get Chests Why Why Why

replies.body: You're in the 'reform' stage. Which basically means because you've been a naughty boy you can't earn rewards for a period of time. Don't bother asking how long it's for because nobody knows. I had a chat ban and was able to earn loot a week after the restriction lifted. Of course if you're toxic in game whilst on reform it will take longer. Basically mute everyone in game, don't say anything and you'll be able to earn loot in a few days.
This has been going on for 4 weeks
The reform period doesn't have a definitive time frame and is situational to each player and the behaviour that resulted in the initial ban/suspension/chat restriction.

honestly its just leauge of legands being stupid and unfair to player who get chat restricted i got trolled by a 4 stack and baned because of it now i cant earn loot leauge suport needs to fix this bug

Reform is an important factor in determining whether players are able to take advantage of the Hextech Crafting system.

Check out this article for more information: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions

Additionally, keep in mind that retaliation isn't an excuse for negative behaviour. If you're being harrassed, it's best to not give them the reaction they're looking for and to report them after the match instead.
